About DevPath

Hello, I'm Jean Michel Eid

I created DevPath to help developers find their path if they are confused and help them learn and grow in their career.

GitHub jeanmicheleid@gmail.com Email

What is DevPath?

DevPath contains community-curated roadmaps, study plans, paths, and resources for developers. There are role-based roadmaps, listing skills you should for any given role, as well as skill-based roadmaps listing items to learn for any given skill.

How are roadmaps created?

Roadmaps are created by researching market demand and listening to user requests. We do the heavy lifting and research so you can enjoy having a comprehensive roadmap with the best curated resources, without having to search through countless websites yourself.

What are the plans for DevPath?

Our long-term plan is to make DevPath a go-to place for developers whenever they plan on learning something new. We started with roadmaps, guides, videos and other visual content but we plan on introducing best practices, best-practices for certain tasks, quizzes to test your knowledge and prepare yourself for the interviews, project ideas to work on while following the roadmaps, public profiles to share your progress and interact with the other learners and so on.

How is DevPath built?

The website is built with Astro and Tailwind

How can I add a new roadmap?

For new roadmaps, you can reach out to jeanmicheleid@gmail.com and suggest your topic. If you're an expert in the field or have valuable resources to share, I'm always open to collaborating to make our content even better.

How can I update an existing roadmap?

If you have suggestions for improving an existing roadmap or think something can be better, please reach out to jeanmicheleid@gmail.com with your ideas. I welcome all feedback and suggestions to make our roadmaps more comprehensive and helpful.

What is the best way to contact you?

Feel free to send me an email at jeanmicheleid@gmail.com. I get lots of messages, so apologies in advance if you don't hear back from me right away, but I do my best to reply to everyone.
